title: Ep. 60 - Talking Value Strategies with Dan Ferris
itunes:title: Talking Value Strategies with Dan Ferris
description: Dan Ferris, editor of the Extreme Value newsletter for S&A, says to take profits right now. He also gives his favorite value plays and sectors for 2011.
